dcterms:creator: M. Mohler
M. Brunson
B. Rink
M. Tomlinson
dcterms:description: This dataset contains paired sentences to determine the accurate interpretation of the metaphoric sentence, focusing on understanding metaphoric expressions in linguistics, philosophy, and cognitive science.
dcterms:title: Metaphor

dcterms:creator: M. Khodak
N. Saunshi
K. Vodrahalli
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on distinguishing between sarcastic and non-sarcastic statements, presenting a challenge for language models due to the reliance on verbal irony and exaggeration.
dcterms:title: SNARKS

dcterms:creator: J. Hoffmann
S. Borgeaud
A. Mensch
E. Buchatskaya
T. Cai
E. Rutherford
D. de Las Casas
L. A. Hendricks
J. Welbl
A. Clark
T. Hennigan
E. Noland
K. Millican
G. van den Driessche
B. Damoc
A. Guy
S. Osindero
K. Simonyan
E. Elsen
J. W. Rae
O. Vinyals
L. Sifre
dcterms:description: This dataset aims to identify whether a given text is intended to be a joke with dark humor or not, exploring the subjective nature of humor.
dcterms:title: Dark Humor Detection

dcterms:creator: R. Rudinger
J. Naradowsky
B. Leonard
B. Van Durme
dcterms:description: This dataset disambiguates sentences by determining the referent of ambiguous pronouns, focusing on gender bias and clarity in language.
dcterms:title: Pronoun Resolution

dcterms:creator: M. Geva
D. Khashabi
E. Segal
T. Khot
D. Roth
J. Berant
dcterms:description: This dataset evaluates the capability of LLMs to detect anachronisms in sentences, focusing on temporal consistency in language.
dcterms:title: Anachronism Recognition

dcterms:creator: D. Hendrycks
C. Burns
S. Basart
A. Critch
J. Li
D. Song
J. Steinhardt
dcterms:description: This dataset assesses the capability of LLMs to match simple ethical questions with human judgment, covering various ethical frameworks.
dcterms:title: SEQ

dcterms:creator: S. Mohammad
S. Kiritchenko
P. Sobhani
X. Zhu
C. Cherry
dcterms:description: This dataset introduces a series of opinion analysis tasks, focusing on stance detection in tweets, particularly in the Twitter domain.
dcterms:title: SemEval

dcterms:creator: S. CH-Wang
A. Saakyan
O. Li
Z. Yu
S. Muresan
dcterms:description: This dataset reflects social norms in American and Chinese culture, aiming to align social situations cross-culturally.
dcterms:title: SocNorm

dcterms:creator: S. CH-Wang
A. Saakyan
O. Li
Z. Yu
S. Muresan
dcterms:description: This dataset extends the SocNorm dataset by including related free-text explanations as external prompts, aiming to align social norms across cultures.
dcterms:title: e-SocNorm

dcterms:creator: J. Huang
D. Yang
dcterms:description: This dataset contains culturally aware premise-hypothesis pairs annotated by cultural groups in the U.S. and India, assessing cultural awareness levels of language models.
dcterms:title: CALI

dcterms:creator: A. Srivastava
A. Rastogi
A. Rao
A. Awal Md Shoeb
A. Abid
A. Fisch
A. R Brown
A. Santoro
A. Gupta
A. Garriga-Alonso
dcterms:description: This dataset seeks to determine the truth of the second sentence based on the meaning of the first, requiring nuanced understanding of sentence meanings.
dcterms:title: Analytic Entailment

dcterms:creator: A. Williams
N. Nangia
S. Bowman
dcterms:description: This dataset introduces a natural language inference task expressed in the international phonetic alphabet, evaluating the model's capacity for composition and knowledge transfer.
dcterms:title: IPA
